prop.name: recipeYield
prop.desc: The quantity produced by the recipe (for example, number of people served, number of servings, etc).

prop.name: recipeCategory
prop.desc: The category of the recipe—for example, appetizer, entree, etc.

prop.name: recipeIngredient
prop.desc: A single ingredient used in the recipe, e.g. sugar, flour or garlic.

prop.name: recipeInstructions
prop.desc: A step in making the recipe, in the form of a single item (document, video, etc.) or an ordered list with HowToStep and/or HowToSection items.

prop.name: nutrition
prop.desc: Nutrition information about the recipe or menu item.

prop.name: suitableForDiet
prop.desc: Indicates a dietary restriction or guideline for which this recipe or menu item is suitable, e.g. diabetic, halal etc.

prop.name: recipeCuisine
prop.desc: The cuisine of the recipe (for example, French or Ethiopian).

prop.name: cookTime
prop.desc: The time it takes to actually cook the dish, in ISO 8601 duration format.

prop.name: cookingMethod
prop.desc: The method of cooking, such as Frying, Steaming, ...

prop.name: ingredients
prop.desc: A single ingredient used in the recipe, e.g. sugar, flour or garlic.

HowTo.name: prepTime
HowTo.desc: The length of time it takes to prepare the items to be used in instructions or a direction, in ISO 8601 duration format.

HowTo.name: tool
HowTo.desc: A sub property of instrument. An object used (but not consumed) when performing instructions or a direction.

HowTo.name: steps
HowTo.desc: The steps in the form of a single item (text, document, video, etc.) or an ordered list with HowToStep and/or HowToSection items.

HowTo.name: performTime
HowTo.desc: The length of time it takes to perform instructions or a direction (not including time to prepare the supplies), in ISO 8601 duration format.

HowTo.name: estimatedCost
HowTo.desc: The estimated cost of the supply or supplies consumed when performing instructions.

HowTo.name: totalTime
HowTo.desc: The total time required to perform instructions or a direction (including time to prepare the supplies), in ISO 8601 duration format.

HowTo.name: supply
HowTo.desc: A sub-property of instrument. A supply consumed when performing instructions or a direction.

HowTo.name: yield
HowTo.desc: The quantity that results by performing instructions. For example, a paper airplane, 10 personalized candles.
